onPartialResults

public void onPartialResults(Bundle b)
Description copied from interface: RecognitionListener
Called on the recognition thread when partial results are available. Note: This is not like android.speech.RecognitionListener in that it does not get called on the main thread.

Specified by:
onPartialResults in interface RecognitionListener
Parameters:
b - Bundle containing the partial result string under the "hyp" key.

onResults

public void onResults(Bundle b)
Description copied from interface: RecognitionListener
Called when final results are available. Note: This is not like android.speech.RecognitionListener in that it does not get called on the main thread.

Specified by:
onResults in interface RecognitionListener
Parameters:
b - Bundle containing the final result string under the "hyp" key.

onError

public void onError(int err)
Description copied from interface: RecognitionListener
Called if a recognition error occurred. Note: This will only ever be passed -1 for the moment, which corresponds to a recognition failure (null result).

Specified by:
onError in interface RecognitionListener
Parameters:
err - Code representing the error that occurred.
